title: Merry Xmas and happy holidays!
body:
Hey everyone,

Hope you're all having a great holiday and getting some time with family and friends. Thank you all for being apart of our community and hopefully we can all enjoy what is to come in 2016!

Here's a highlight from my game on xmas day =)
https://www.facebook.com/Maraudaur/videos/551028641720888/

replies.body: wait a rioter without a life :O
Merry Christmas, hope yours is fun and exciting! Mine got ruined due to Riot support still refusing to gift a mystery skin to the OCE players that were confused by the announcement.

Hey Krawia,

I can definitely ensure thats fixed up early January. What was your ticket number?

#19789796

Thank you so much for reply, sorry to disturb your Christmas.
